{"isStared":0,"auth":2,"description":"3D 饼环图初步完成，surface 隐藏 grid3D\n（点击可以选中，滑过可以放大，\n内径/外径比 internalDiameterRatio 设置为 0 可得到普通饼图）\n\n原始参数方程：\nx: cosA * (1 + r * cosB)\ny: sinA * (1 + r * sinB)\nz: r * sinB > 0 ? h : -h\n角度 A，角度 B，r < 1， h 为饼环厚度\n新增简易 label 显示@20210613\n\n\n第 7 版做了渐变色尝试，如不需要，请手动选择第 6 版@20211228","rankScore":0.000000004,"avatar":"83065a58616e64363138680b","title":"3D 饼环图初步完成","userName":"Z***8","version":7,"commentCount":26,"uid":"bd-101698999","starCount":87,"createTime":"2020-07-29T08:29:23.000Z","forkFrom":"-","isCustomThumbnail":1,"viewCount":8945,"isSpam":0,"cid":"xojSDhHAMm","lastUpdateTime":"2021-12-28T06:03:35.000Z","thumbnailURL":"https://www.makeapie.com/ecg-storage/ec_gallery_thumbnail/xojSDhHAMm.png?v=1623523593140"}
